summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3916 for the improvement of 37th Avenue Southwest, from West Snoqualmie Street to West Dakota Street; by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 47666, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
